overview:
A 12-year public relations and marketing veteran with experience in the video games, mobile/wireless and consumer electronics/goods industries, Little currently handles Business Development for Manumatix, a leading developer of mobile and social media platforms.

Concurrently, Little continues to work in the PR world, working primarily with mobile apps and video games clients, as well as handling the PR efforts for Manumatix.

In his life as a PR man, Little has worked with numerous high profile accounts such as Codemasters, S2 Games, WorldGaming (now VirginGaming), Major League Gaming, Global Gaming League, and Voodoo PC to name a few. One of his greatest achievement was spearheading and handling all PR efforts for VoodooPC. Tasked with taking the concept of that â€œold grey boxâ€ from under the desk and turning them into fun works of art led Little to helping VoodooPC achieve unprecedented mainstream consumer exposure. This ultimately helped Voodoo position themselves for their acquisition by HP in the Fall of 2006.

Little graduated from Laval University in Quebec City, Canada with a Bachelor of Arts in Communications/minor in Marketing. He currently resides in Hermosa Beach, CA and is an avid beach volleyball player! You will also find him on the golf course from time to time working to get his score below 90!
